section.title: term Struct Reference

para.para: Represents a single term in a polynomial.

section.section:
Detailed Description
Represents a single term in a polynomial.
A term is composed of a coefficient and an exponent. For example, the term 3xÂ² has coefficient = 3 and exponent = 2.
